title: Asynchronous Individualized Language Learning Design: Project-Based Job Competency Enhancement

context.prior_knowledge: Basic language proficiency and understanding of job-related terminology
context.additional_context: Providing flexible smartphone-based learning environments, designing language projects focused on practical application

learning_goals: Learners achieve over 80% proficiency in asynchronously analyzing and summarizing job-related language materials within four weeks.
Based on individualized feedback, learners can revise and improve project outcomes at least three times.
Through formative assessment quizzes, learners can accurately utilize over five key expressions per week.

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Easy - Simple structure with minimal constraints
